sentence.Network_en: I didn't see that my career as a film-maker was going anywhere.
sentence.Network_cn: 我发现我作为电影制片人的职业没有什么发展前途。

sentence.Network_en: Not for nothing was the plane called "The widow-maker"
sentence.Network_cn: 这种飞机被称作“寡妇机”是事出有因的。

sentence.Network_en: The famed film-maker slammed the claims as "an outrageous lie"
sentence.Network_cn: 这位大名鼎鼎的电影制片人声色俱厉地抨击了这些说法，称之为“无耻的谎言”。

entry.def: The maker of a product is the firm that manufactures it.

example.tran: 日本最大的两家汽车制造商

example.ex: ...the makers of chocolates, sweets and biscuits.
example.tran: 巧克力、糖果和饼干生产商

entry.def: You can refer to the person who makes something as its maker .

example.ex: ...the makers of news and current affairs programmes.
example.tran: 新闻和时事节目制作人

means.word_mean: 2. a business engaged in manufacturing some product

Sentence.sentence: Yet neither Barack Obama nor Mitt Romney promotes himself as tool-savvy (使用工具很在行的) presidential timber, in the mold of a Jimmy Carter, a skilled carpenter and cabinet maker.
At the end of the passage, the author suggests that decision makers view the statistics with a critical eye.
decision makers view the statistics with a critical eye

sentences.en: He is a trouble maker. You must be distant with him.
sentences.cn: 他是个捣蛋鬼,你不要跟他在一起。

sentences.en: The car was out of control.
sentences.cn: There was nothing I could do except prepare to meet my maker!汽车失控了,我完全无能为力,只能准备去见上帝！
